document.body:
Italian Restaurant « Why do expensive restaurants expect you to pay big tips? New ideas for a fast food restaurant menu? » Where is the best restaurant in Israel?
Where is the best restaurant in Israel? Which is your favorite restaurant? Is there a GOOD restaurant guide?
You should know that I do not want restaurants designed for tourist. Whoa, B, you aren’t winning me over with that argument! You’ve successfully alienated someone who might have listened if you had appeared thoughtful and intelligent. By the way, my IQ is over 150, and we are not friends. Ok B. Just don’t expect to be taken as a serious, rational person.
